lead_paragraph: Renault's Kevin Magnussen will start Sunday's Bahrain Formula One Grand Prix from the pitlane for failing to stop for mandatory weighing during Friday practice.

headline.print_headline: Magnussen to Start From Pit Lane in Bahrain
headline.main: Magnussen to Start From Pit Lane in Bahrain
